raw: Paul Watson  Personal Information  Gender Male Age 38 Nationality British Location Vienna, Austria  Education Bachelor's in Business Administration University of Edinburgh, UK  Experience Program Coordinator ZED Tech Solutions  Coordinated various technology projects, including software implementations and system upgrades. Developed and implemented sales strategies to expand market presence and increase revenue. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify process improvements and optimize  operational efficiency. January 2014 – January 2016 (2 years) Glasgow, UK  Skills  Project coordination and management  Sales and business development  Analytical skills and data analysis  Client relationship management  Strong communication and interpersonal skills  Adaptability and quick learning ability
